title: Calories in 6 oz Blueberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 6 oz blueberries, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
assumptions: Fresh, raw blueberries; 6 oz ≈ 170 g; no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 6 oz fresh blueberries provide ~97 kcal, mostly from carbs with good fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 6 oz blueberries?
faqs.a: Approximately 97 kcal for 6 oz fresh blueberries.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 6 oz blueberries?
faqs.a: About 24.6 g carbs, including 4.1 g fiber and 17 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are blueberries low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.5 g fat and 1.2 g protein in 6 oz.

faqs.q: Do blueberries have cholesterol or sodium?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 mg cholesterol and 2 mg sodium in 6 oz.

faqs.q: How do frozen blueberries compare calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar to fresh, around 97 kcal for 6 oz, with minor water loss variations.
